full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,LAM GYI GTZO BO RNAM GSUM LA GSHA' SGOM BYA TSUL 'DON SGRIGS SU BKOD PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI, SGRUB SDE'I TSOGS PA'I ZHAL 'DON DU, TSIGS BCAD DNGOS GZHI RNAMS DRIN CAN BLA MA RDO RJE 'CHANG 'JAM DBYANGS THUB BSTAN NYI MA DPAL BZANG PO'I GSUNG GTZANG MAR BKOD PA STE, BAN RGAN ^DAM TSIG RDO RJES SO, ,'DIS KYANG JAM MGON BLA MA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE DAR RGYAS YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
